mapper.insert: insert into sys_oper_log(title, business_type, method, request_method, operator_type, oper_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_location, oper_param, json_result, status, error_msg, create_time) values (#{title}, #{businessType}, #{method}, #{requestMethod}, #{operatorType}, #{operName}, #{operUrl}, #{operIp}, #{operLocation}, #{operParam}, #{jsonResult}, #{status}, #{errorMsg}, sysdate())
